website_summaries.verdict: A budget-priced shower dispenser. Simple design is good for the guest or children's bathroom.
pros: The sides slightly taper in, so you could install it in a corner if desired
Mount with screws or double-sided tape and silicone glue, all included
cons: A handful of owners say this dispenser isn't up to the usual quality of the manufacturer

customer_reviews.title: Best Dispenser for the Money
customer_reviews.text: This is the best shower product dispenser I have found for the money. Other brands will have 2 or 3 dispensers in a single unit which make maintenance difficult. Single units are the way to go. The overall quality is very good. These are aesthetically pleasing to look at. The one design issue I have is that they failed to make the locking detent significant enough to ensure the unit stays attached to the mounting plate so it can easily pop off the mount and fall. I came up with my own fix for this which solves that problem.
customer_reviews.author: Mark F. Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: These do NOT function.
customer_reviews.text: These do not function to dispense any liquid with a higher viscosity than pure water. This includes soap. I tried using three different units.
customer_reviews.author: Bort

customer_reviews.title: My toes are happier, now!
customer_reviews.text: I buy the big bottles of shampoo/conditioner at Costco, and they're always falling on my toes in the shower. These things cleared up space and my toes are less sore these days. Once up and filled, they need to be primed. They're not going to just immediately start giving you product. I suggest pumping and holding a finger over the hole and that creates the suction and you'll soon be enjoying their convenience. Just make sure the bathroom is moisture free and stays that way for a few hours afterwards. Stuff needs to cure after installation. Totally recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Bellina

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Love these, but definitely wouldn't recommend using the tape to install. Go the extra step and use the screws and anchors. We have tile and were hopeful they'd stay. We cleaned, using alcohol, and fully dried before installing. We didn't use the shower for almost two days, and after the second shower, one of them fell down. Luckily it didn't break - props for solid workmanship. We then installed into the grout using screws and anchors and they're very solid now. Love that they don't dispense a lot of product at once, since we're no longer wasting and washing that all down the drain.
customer_reviews.author: Jay Doe

customer_reviews.title: Buy it, but expect to invest in another double sided tape brand, such as Scotch.
customer_reviews.text: I really love this soap disoenser. My only issue is that the double sided tape is not strong enough to hold the product. They fell withing 24 hour of install. I wanted to keep the products so I went to my local Home Depot and bought some scotch double sided tape and since then I never had any issue with the dispensers. I have to say that I hang them on a mirror, I haven't try to put one in the shower yet. I will write an update when I do try it.
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: It looks great but need to be selected for the liquids
customer_reviews.text: What can I say but the product looks great. It functions well if you use fluids such as soap, shampoo and lotions that are not too thick. Like all the other users, I trying the included two side tape on just one of them at first and it fell off in less than a month. I found out a secret to it though through experimentation. If you cut the included two sided tape in half and put one half on the bottom and the other half on top over the place where the screw would have gone through, the unit will not fall off. Mines, have not fallen off since I did that. It's been on for over 3 months.
customer_reviews.author: Si D.

customer_reviews.title: WAS Nice but with minimal dispensing power AND NOW IT LEAKS
customer_reviews.text: Overall very nice, but you have to push the button to get the soap out over half a dozen time as it only dispenses a very tiny bit with each depression. I find this very annoying! UPDATED: I have been using this for awhile and out of nowhere now one of them now leaks. I have cleaned it up and refilled it, still leaks. As you can see from the attached pictures. The soap on the far right is much lower than the rest. Before it started leaking they were all level to each other. Also notice the pool of soap in my bathtub. Took about a day or two to get that much.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Mathis

customer_reviews.title: This product did not work well
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these dispensers to replace another set that had worked well for many years, but one of the dispensers in that set finally failed. This new set would not dispense the body soap I was using at all, apparently because it was too thick. When I changed to a "thinner" body soap it worked, but it took about 10-15 pumps to get what the old dispenser would put out in 4 pumps. I would just say that I miss my old system and these seem inadequate compared to the older model. I'm going to look for another brand and try to replicate what I had before.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Lowe

customer_reviews.title: Help
customer_reviews.text: I cannot contact the sellers. I bought a 3 pack and one of them does not pump. I just want a replacement of the one that’s not working. I installed them in a concrete shower so taking them back off and returning them for a new set is out of the question. I do not want to return the mounting bracket just the single pump dispenser. Please contact me to resolve my problem.
customer_reviews.author: Kendra K.

customer_reviews.title: So cute!
customer_reviews.text: I really like these a lot! So easy to install. Easy to fill, easy access on or off the wall. You can get as many of these as you need, you're not limited to 3 or 2, they fit in narrow spaces where the usual dispensers will not. You can arrange them any way you like them! Great idea for shower dispensers!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer Val

customer_reviews.title: Pea size soap every 8 pumps.
customer_reviews.text: I filled these with body wash and shampoo, shampoo is quite thin as I use the free and clear. The pumps took hundreds of pumps just to get primed. Then you need to pump at least 8 times just to get a tiny pea size drop of soap. The real problem is that the pumps sucks from both sides, there seems to not be a one way valve to keep air out. Normally that would allow all the suction to draw thicker soap into the chamber. This allos air to come back in through the output, and obviously the air is easier to pull in than soap. So you get 2%soap and 98%air in each push.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy carter

customer_reviews.title: Only good for hand soap.
customer_reviews.text: They look nice. The double sided tape seems to work fine. That's where the positives end. They are very cheaply made and these might only be good for hand soap. After filling them with shampoo/conditioner/bodywash, then actually using them, we found out that they only squirt out MAYBE a dime sized amount. I don't even think it's that much. When you have daughters with long hair, that just isn't going to work. Most definitely not for shower use. And now I still have 6 in boxes that I can't use. I guess they might be perfect for someone with little to no hair who is very short and doesn't need very much.
customer_reviews.author: Jonnie

customer_reviews.title: Great value for the price and no bottles to knock down
customer_reviews.text: I've gone from having several bottles and bars of soap down to this dispenser system and a razor in my shower. It looks SO MUCH better and they work well. They're made of plastic and eventually I may change them out for stainless steel or something a bit classier, but for now they do a great job at a reasonable price.
customer_reviews.author: Dave L

customer_reviews.title: Nice design, but slip out easily.
customer_reviews.text: These are a nice design, however they sometimes slip out of there bracket mounts. I'm afraid that one day they will fall off and land on my foot. I recommend the manufacture look into designing some sort of snap in contention, so they don't slip out so easily. However, I really like how they are easy to refill and clean, since they come of the wall.
customer_reviews.author: Cat Calvosa

customer_reviews.title: Theyre alright
customer_reviews.text: I had to buy durable outdoor strength velcro to keep them on my shower walls. The amount they disperse per pump as well is very small. so theyre better suited to handsoap or something you dont need a decent amount of. no one wants to pump 25 times just to wash their hair.
customer_reviews.author: Kari

customer_reviews.title: Attractive but does not dispense thick liquids
customer_reviews.text: This is a very attractive set of shampoo, conditioner and body wash holders. The adhesive works very well. (Make sure your tile or other surface is VERY clean, free of all soap or residue. Use alcohol on tile and allow to dry before attaching 2-sided tape.) The only downfall is that I have had to thin out all shampoos, conditioners and body washes 30% in order for the liquid to flow through the dispenser holes into my hands.
customer_reviews.author: CTH

customer_reviews.title: Adhesive doesn’t work.
customer_reviews.text: If you want to waste your shampoo & conditioner and have it spill all over your bathtub or shower purchase these. I first noticed that the shampoo was leaking out of the dispenser which was frustrating so I took that one down to look at it. That same night I heard a huge bang noise and discovered that the conditioner and soap container just fell off the wall (soap and conditioner was everywhere). The adhesive doesn’t work, I didn’t nail or screw it into the wall so maybe that’s a better solution.
customer_reviews.author: Amber Carter

customer_reviews.title: A bit smaller than other options but works great. The only downside is the sticky didn't last ...
customer_reviews.text: This product is really cute. A bit smaller than other options but works great. The only downside is the sticky didn't last and nearly all of them (I have a total of 6) fell off. But none broke! So we bought Scotch Extreme Mounting Tape, we hope that will keep them on. We will be ordering more for our last shower.
customer_reviews.author: JessiLMP

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price.
customer_reviews.text: These are okay. They look great though. One of them kept leaking soap and another one that the company replaced it with isn't pumping soap out. I would recommend if you are planning to use tape, you will need to buy better mounting tape. The one they had only works on one of them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cheap feeling and looking
customer_reviews.text: These are kind of cheap feeling. The double sided tape was easy to apply The top flips open to fill. The button to get the hand sanitizer out feels like it will break. It does hold the liquid hand sanitizer without leaking.
customer_reviews.author: Angel44fire

customer_reviews.title: Nice look, but design is flawed
customer_reviews.text: Arrived and they look sharp. One however had a part of the silver plastic coming apart. Also the kids have a flip up lid on the top, which unknown to us as the time caused water to come into the unit when showering. So unless using in a dry location, I would find one with a lip on the lid to prevent water from falling into the tops of the soap.
customer_reviews.author: DJeremyC

customer_reviews.title: Great customer service. Read review for product info.
customer_reviews.text: I think these dispensers work best with thinner consistency liquids. I had trouble getting Paul Mitchell shampoo and Dial body wash to pump well. However, Innerplan was outstanding to deal with. I was going to chalk it up to just a bad match of products but they reached out and after I gave them feedback - offered a refund or replacement with nothing to send back. This is the kind of seller that makes Amazon a great place to buy.
customer_reviews.author: Ezell house

customer_reviews.title: Horrid junk
customer_reviews.text: The tops don't close all the way so water gets in and dilutes all your soap. The adhesion tabs don't stick to anything for long so you'll wake up to everything being on the floor and possibly broken. Skip these. They are basically junk.
customer_reviews.author: Tricia

customer_reviews.title: Fell off the wall
customer_reviews.text: I followed the instruction and used the adhesive. It fell off the wall about 48 hours later - spilling $50 worth of shampoo. I had a different one before and it stayed on the wall for 9 years! In fact it's still up at our hold house. I am so unhappy with this purchase and even more unhappy that I lost expensive shampoo. In addition, these containers are not linked together, they come individually which I wasn't aware of when I bought it. It looks like one unit in the photos. I would not recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy Duncan

customer_reviews.title: We will use the screws from now on because we like the unit
customer_reviews.text: The containers themselves are stylish and large, but as previous reviews show, they do not hang on the wall well with the strips. Ours fell off the next day after putting soap in it. We will use the screws from now on because we like the unit. We had really hoped the strips would hold it in the RV, but they did not.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Just the right size and great look without the clutter.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these to eliminate the clutter in my shower. They secure tightly and very attractive. I wish only that they came with labels to attach to the outside of the containers. All my products are white.
customer_reviews.author: Judith

customer_reviews.title: They do not stay on the wall
customer_reviews.text: I am not impressed with this product. I bought 9 of them for my business. Easy to put up and they look amazing. Then they one by one fell off wall with a huge mess and a waste of money of both the dispenser and the soap lost.
customer_reviews.author: vicki Ingraham

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't hold sticked to the wall
customer_reviews.text: Great look and design, but the ones I used for Conditioner and Shampoo only sticked to the wall for 1.5 days before peeling off, and the one with body soap lasted for about a month before eventually peeling off the glue and crashing into the ground. They just use a very poor sticking tape
customer_reviews.author: Gustavo Vargas

customer_reviews.title: ... seem to be an option so I guess a bad review is all I have
customer_reviews.text: I would have preferred to get a refund but it does not seem to be an option so I guess a bad review is all I have. I put the dispensers on my bathroom wall. The next day I put in my lotions. The next day the dispensers fell off the wall. What a mess. What makes me know it was the dispensers and not me is because the adhesives split. Some of the adhesive cane down with the dispenser and some of the adhesive stayed on the wall. What a mess. Not only do I not have the dispensers, I do t have the money and I lost at least $25 of product, Pureology.
customer_reviews.author: just judy

customer_reviews.title: Good product, got on time
customer_reviews.text: Good product and is as describe. only issue I found is no way to adjust +/- the soap dispensed quantity. You have press couple of time to get the enough to wash hands. And for same reason not recommended for shampoo usage.
customer_reviews.author: Hami Archer

customer_reviews.title: Good product over all
customer_reviews.text: Good product over all, but does not seem to pump as much product as i had expected per pump. Wife likes the design so she is happy with it and thats all that matters in the end.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce A Monroe

customer_reviews.title: Perfect - just what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.text: Really like this product. I read reviews on a couple of different models. Many had difficulty staying attached to the shower wall. Because this one is three pieces, I felt it would be less likely to fall, since the weight is distributed differently. It was easy to install. Have had it up for a few days and no problems. The only negative is opening the tops is a little difficult. They need to be redesigned to have a way to get a hold of the top and open it for refilling.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Chaparro

customer_reviews.title: Garbage! Bought it
customer_reviews.text: Garbage ! Bought it , installed it loaded it with soap and it started leaking the soap immediately all over my kitchen counter. A total piece of garbage.
customer_reviews.author: justin

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money
customer_reviews.text: I purchased 3 of these for my RV to use with shampoo, conditioner and body wash. Took FOREVER to prime the pumps and when something finally started to come out it was a teeny little bit, so you have to press it more than 10 times to get enough in your hand to actually wash. After a few weeks they stopped working completely... waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: kjamali

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful. But does NOT pump
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful display Elegant Fun product colors show through DOES NOT PUMP well. Must pump 10-15 times to accumulate a small amount of product into your hand. They are currently on the shower walls but not being used.
customer_reviews.author: wc

customer_reviews.title: Would purchase better one next time
customer_reviews.text: They are plastic. The adhesive is no good, the day after I put them up the fell and broke. Definitely needs to be put up with screws and the pumps are horrible.
customer_reviews.author: Barbie

customer_reviews.title: Dont bother
customer_reviews.text: They are cheaply made and dont put enough product out per push of the button so you have to constantly press. Adhesive does not hold up for any substantial period of time and they come crashing down with all the product pooling at the bottom of the shower. Bought these to save space and reduce clutter in the shower, but through all the hassle am back to the old ways with loss of products and money wasted.
customer_reviews.author: matthew

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Love the convenience and freed up space in the shower,but too small of an amount comes out. Takes a good bit to get enough out to use. If it doesn’t seem to work at first use, keep pumping it til it comes out. One took long time very first time, then fine after.
customer_reviews.author: McKinley

customer_reviews.title: Meh...not impressed
customer_reviews.text: These pumps looked awesome out of the box. I cleaned the shower and made sure it was dry, hung them up and waited till the next day to put any liquid in them. As soon as liquid was in them they all fell off the wall. I haven't attempted to hang them again with any other adhecives.
customer_reviews.author: Summer Showalter

customer_reviews.title: Looks great but stingy with the product.
customer_reviews.text: Takes a while after you fill it to get any of the product to come out, so keep pushing the button. And it definitely will save on your product as it only gives out a little bit at a time. But they look spectacular
customer_reviews.author: Kristen Kipp

customer_reviews.title: Cheap product
customer_reviews.text: Trash product. Takes 50+ pumps to get the flow started. Too covers don't stay on. Pumps small amount of product need to pump 20 times just to get enough shampoo. Already put in the garbage
customer_reviews.author: Brad Ickes

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Over all good bought a 3 pack .. can’t put my thick moisturizer conditioner in them doesn’t pump out well or at all
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Organized feeling
customer_reviews.text: Very nice in my shower. Better than having to bend over or find room for the bottle. The body wash and shampoo come out five the conditioner is too thick
customer_reviews.author: Jaden Klafka

customer_reviews.title: Doesnt work well on shinny surfaces
customer_reviews.text: Bought to put into tub area after a new bath. Looks good. Kept falling of of tile surround.Finally had to drill holes into tile to hold. Always leaked at bottom of one dispenser. Took down to refill for the first time, and the back pieces broke on one. If they didn't look so nice and have holes in my tiles, wouldn't even bother. I am ordering one more time and hopefully they will work better.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra Mattila

customer_reviews.title: Strips very disapointed
customer_reviews.text: The strips they come with aren't worth a crap. I followed instructions to the T. As soon as I filled with soap 6 hours later. They fell off the wall during the night. I wasn't going to drill a hole in my shower and chance water getting through. We went to Lowe's and got Gorilla mounting tape. I haven't had any trouble so far.I recommend using the Gorilla strips, if you don't mind having it in your wall for a long time!!
customer_reviews.author: GABRIEL C.

customer_reviews.title: Overall good
customer_reviews.text: These are smaller than I thought they would be. They look very nice were easy to install. They do not work with thick products
customer_reviews.author: Kasey

customer_reviews.title: HotelSpaWave Luxury Soap/Shampoo/Lotion Modular-Design Shower Dispenser System (Pack of 3)
customer_reviews.text: perfect for Hands Soap - easy to install - I used the adhesive and the screws that came with the unit - not bulky like some other products = luve it love the looks of it *****
customer_reviews.author: H.

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful looking, easy to install with 3M tape included
customer_reviews.text: Very nice look, compact size, 300ml capacity. I was expecting bigger size but was amazed to find beautiful looking compact dispenser. Included 3M double sided tape held it perfectly and weight of 300ml shampoo is minimal on it so hopefully it will stick there for a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Ash G

customer_reviews.title: Poor double sided tape
customer_reviews.text: Actual containers/pumps seem to work just fine but the double sided tape it comes with to stick it to the shower is of extremely poor quality. It’s not that it doesn’t stick to the wall, it’s that the glue separates from the double sided pad completely. 2 of the 3 containers have fallen while only being partially filled with soap, busting the top off and wasting the soap after they fall. Will need to buy some good double sided tape to see if these can be salvaged before I return them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Brake easily
customer_reviews.text: 2 out of the 3 broke and its only been 7 months. It was the plastic hooks that hang onto the wall bracket that broke with little to no force applied
customer_reviews.author: IslandLasse

customer_reviews.title: Great size
customer_reviews.text: They are what I was looking for except they seem like cheap plastic. We will see how they hold up. I can’t get one of them to pump out my hair conditioner. I’m going to keep trying before I ask for a refund
customer_reviews.author: Jo Kenngott

customer_reviews.title: My gorgeous Bathroom ❤️❤️
customer_reviews.text: I ❤️❤️❤️❤️ My dispensers and after upgrading my bathroom these look so expensive and easy to install. My bathroom look so beautiful 😊😊
customer_reviews.author: MW

customer_reviews.title: easy install, used provided tape
customer_reviews.text: easy install, used provided tape. looks like a lux hotel in my bathroom! Nice touch, holds shampoo, conditioner and body wash. Colors of product shows through clear container. Very nice!!!! Bought sister a set and she loves it!
customer_reviews.author: D TJ

customer_reviews.title: Useless for most products.
customer_reviews.text: I bought 9 of these things. To get the amount of shampoo, conditioner or body wash that I'm used to I literally have to pump the thing over 100 times. (No joke! I counted!) Would not purchase again for sure! I'm already looking to replace them. I guess you get what you pay for here...
customer_reviews.author: Kristin Dragos

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase once FULLY set up
customer_reviews.text: Works perfectly once you get it going. It takes a good little bit to prime and get anything out of it. Only dispences a small amount at a time so good for teaching portion control to children and young adults. Sticks to the wall easily and no major work to get it up.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Duke

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed in product, Not easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: Product is attractive and easy to install. However even after priming each one it was hard to dispense the product. I had to dilute my conditioner 1/2 water/1/2 conditioner in order for it to come out. The holes should be larger. I have to push the dispenser button at least 8 - 10 times to get enough to shampoo etc.
customer_reviews.author: Lorrie Lindsey

customer_reviews.title: May cost you more money.
customer_reviews.text: Well, week one, I was very pleased with my purchase. They went up easily and look nice. Just one day shy of two weeks, the adhesive separated from the mounting foam, costing me a full bottle of shampoo down the drain. Now I wait for the other two to fail.
customer_reviews.author: Dana

customer_reviews.title: I don't want to used the screws and I have used the strips that came with other products and they have been fine.. wasted a lot of money in spilt
customer_reviews.text: I have put two of these up put the adhesive strip on the back and stick it to the wall for 6hrs and then filled it with soap after a week both feel off the shower wall why is this ? I don't want to used the screws and I have used the strips that came with other products and they have been fine.. wasted a lot of money in spilt shampoo
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ... stylish and if it worked it would be bery useful. Spent two days trying to get it to ...
customer_reviews.text: It looks stylish and if it worked it would be bery useful. Spent two days trying to get it to stick to our shower wall without any weight added to it and the container kept falling off, leaving the adhesive on the wall. Used gorilla glue as support between the adhesive strip and the container but it did nothing except bring the adhesive down. After making several attempts and a few containers breaking, I would not recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Friend

customer_reviews.title: Will not stay on the wall with supplied adhesive strips.
customer_reviews.text: The containers will not stay on the wall. We have tried various Velcro strips, glue strips but no luck. Our last attempt will be the waterproof strips which should have come with this to begin with. Also, lost three containers of soap since they fell and the lids came off. I would not buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel De La Garza

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.text: Product arrived on time, does as its suppose to. Just not the best quality. Spend alittle extra for a nicer one, save yourself from the item being put on the shelve unused.
customer_reviews.author: Cameron101

customer_reviews.title: Pump doesnt work well
customer_reviews.text: They work great. Except after one use they no longer want to pump out the liquid.
customer_reviews.author: Sherri Barrett

customer_reviews.title: Aesthetically Pleasing Organization
customer_reviews.text: I love the shape and aesthetically pleasing organization this provides in our shower. We added decals (Shampoo conditioner body wash) to the fronts as well. They look great!
customer_reviews.author: APRIL AWADALLA

customer_reviews.title: Great pump, requires frequent pumps to get going
customer_reviews.text: Purchased these for my kids who constantly waste shampoo and body soap while showering. They work great so far, but please be aware you will spend a good 10 min, trying to get the first pump out. Good thing, I read the reviews ahead of time so I expected it, otherwise I might have given up and returned them. They work as expected.
customer_reviews.author: Erik Cartagena

customer_reviews.title: NO FIXING SCREWS NOR ADHESIVE STRIPS HOW DO YOU EXPECT ...
customer_reviews.text: NO FIXING SCREWS NOR ADHESIVE STRIPS HOW DO YOU EXPECT PEOPLE TO USE THIS HANG IT FROM THE CEILING. I BOUGHT SIX OF THEM. INTER LINK ROUDUCT INT. NJ. THIS CHINESE PRODUCT DO NOT BUY AGAIN AND WILL NOT LET BUY OTHERS
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Small Than I thought...
customer_reviews.text: I request this item in Prime and delivery took longer than a regular. When it finally arrived, packaging was good however I was expecting something a bit bigger. Still design seams to be good,also quality. Let's see!
customer_reviews.author: Kath

customer_reviews.title: OK
customer_reviews.text: The wall mount option is not very secure, but they do function as they should
customer_reviews.author: BamaBen

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy this
customer_reviews.text: The adhesive that comes with it is crap! Bought 2 of these for 2 bathrooms, cleaned the surface before sticking it on smooth surface. 4 out of 6 dispensers fell off over 3 days spilling all the soap all over the bath tubs! These adhesives can't really hold the dispensers with a few ounces of soap gel.. very disappointing
customer_reviews.author: Nagaraja Lnu

customer_reviews.title: Don't be deceived by the look!
customer_reviews.text: I bought the 3 pack option. One dispenser doesn't pump even after priming for awhile. Second dispenser leaked (content was Bath & Body Work shower gel). Wasted my stuff! Third one barely works. The only thing I like about this is the design.
customer_reviews.author: Simplified

customer_reviews.title: these are not durable
customer_reviews.text: in just under 10month they falling apart and have to change them soon. :(
customer_reviews.author: joviansys

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: I used the adhesive strips to hang these in my shower several months ago. No issues so far! Made sure the surface was clean and dry per the directions.
customer_reviews.author: Hannah

customer_reviews.title: Received Broken
customer_reviews.text: We bought these for our RV. Opened one box when received and it looked great. We didn't open the other two until we had the RV ready to put them in. The other two dispensers had the clips broken off and are useless. We are past Amazon's return policy so we are stuck with two that are absolutely useless.
customer_reviews.author: Happy Customer

customer_reviews.title: Truthfull
customer_reviews.text: Ok, no damaged and they worked. But the "sticky tape" they give you just won't hold them up in your shower. When they hit the ground shampoo, conditioner and soap go everywhere. Lol Even after all that, they still worked. So I screwed them above the shop sink!
customer_reviews.author: tyler griffin

customer_reviews.title: I love entertaining guests and every once in awhile a few ...
customer_reviews.text: I love entertaining guests and every once in awhile a few will stay over and enjoy my hospitality. With that said, I like to offer my guests total comfort and a great experience which includes the shower. The hotel/spa dispenser is elegant and adds style and beauty to my bathroom.
customer_reviews.author: Hector Santana

customer_reviews.title: helpful and easy
customer_reviews.text: helpful and easy to install, I like it and my wife is very happy with it. :)
customer_reviews.author: Yasser

customer_reviews.title: Poorly constructed product.
customer_reviews.text: Made cheaply of cheat material. One was broken during shipping. One would not stick (the sticky pad was defective). Last one would not pump out soap. Poorly constructed product. Not worth the asking price even if they had been fully functional.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Graham

customer_reviews.title: Nice for guest too
customer_reviews.text: These dispensers are awesome! Out of the nine I ordered one of them leaks.
customer_reviews.author: Christina Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Not working
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product because it looks nice but after all the effort of pumping, nothing coming out.
customer_reviews.author: PEARL C LE

customer_reviews.title: Practical use
customer_reviews.text: Nice but expected coloras in the picture but is is clear
customer_reviews.author: Donna Van Kessel

customer_reviews.title: Looks nice in my shower
customer_reviews.text: Must pump at least 45-50 times at first use before liquid will come out. Quick shipping.
customer_reviews.author: Lana M Howard

customer_reviews.title: Can't give these as gifts
customer_reviews.text: Bought 3 sets of 3. The suction is horrible on these. When you do finally get suction it puts out just a very small amount of soap. Takes 10 or so pumps to get enough to shampoo short hair. They look nice, good size but can't give them as gifts.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Would Buy Again
customer_reviews.text: They were easy to install and look really good also. It did take awhile to get the soaps to come out, but all is good now.
customer_reviews.author: Tandi Colibert

customer_reviews.title: Save your money
customer_reviews.text: Although it's supposed to be made for conditioner..conditioner does not come out of the barrel, it is too thick..if you have very thin shampoo and body soap they will work somewhat..for me it was a waste of money
customer_reviews.author: Maria Basham

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Design
customer_reviews.text: I love that they are individual and not connected so you can put them anywhere and buy exactly what you need. The outer design is elegant.
customer_reviews.author: Nikki Wooldridge

customer_reviews.title: Great value for the money
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic as a soup dispenser. Use it next to every sink in the house
customer_reviews.author: Ariel Shtauber

customer_reviews.title: Worked great.
customer_reviews.text: After reading the reviews I decided to get command shower adhesive strips to mount them. They are holding up great!
customer_reviews.author: Keunok

customer_reviews.title: Sticks well
customer_reviews.text: Be sure they are exactly where you want them. Once applied I could not get them off of shower tiles.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good item. Great deal too. Reccomend
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Strong and good quality. No drip, I think depend for liquid soap. I bought 6 of that. Work really well.
customer_reviews.author: JR

customer_reviews.title: Ok product
customer_reviews.text: The sticky stuff lasted less then 24 hours then fell off so I had to screw them on. They work fine
customer_reviews.author: Bambi M

customer_reviews.title: The size and design are perfect
customer_reviews.text: The size is perfect, liquid comes easily and comes a good quantity.
customer_reviews.author: Sowmya

customer_reviews.title: Yup
customer_reviews.text: Only problem I have seen is that the slightest movement upward can cause it to be knocked off the track holding it up
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: it is very difficult for the conditioner to come out.
customer_reviews.text: the adhesive it brings is useless, it peeled off 3 times and almost broke.
customer_reviews.author: Julio posadas

customer_reviews.title: Tape provided not strong enough
customer_reviews.text: Our shower wall is slightly textured in RV, tape didn't hold so well. We mounted using provided screws.
customer_reviews.author: Gville ggram

customer_reviews.title: I have now wasted money on this product
customer_reviews.text: Twice now the chambers have fallen off of the shower wall. I have never had this happened before. The tape is separating from the adhesive part, leaving the adhesive on the shower wall. I have now wasted money on this product, as well as the shampoo and soaps that I had in them. I DO NOT recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: a waste  to buy
customer_reviews.text: They did not work for me at all, a waste of money
customer_reviews.author: Rodney L. Cooper Sr.

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for our camper shower. Makes showering more pleasant and neat.
customer_reviews.author: E. Honeycutt

customer_reviews.title: Adhesive doesn’t work
customer_reviews.text: Looked nice and worked for a week, then the adhesive gave out, and each fell one by one and broke due to the fall.
customer_reviews.author: Mom of 3

customer_reviews.title: They didn't hold up well on the shower wall, ...
customer_reviews.text: They didn't hold up well on the shower wall, fell down and broke within a couple hours of putting them up, so now I can't return them or get a refund.
customer_reviews.author: L. Tuley

customer_reviews.title: Sticker doesn't go well on walls
customer_reviews.text: When I stocked the product on wall using the sticker it fell down after some time and whole soap fell on ground Later I used the screws.
customer_reviews.author: Mazhar

customer_reviews.title: they work great!
customer_reviews.text: I use these in my RV for hand soap, body wash, and shampoo...they work great!
customer_reviews.author: Melanie Brown

product_meta.title: HotelSpaWave Luxury Soap/Shampoo/Lotion Modular-Design Shower Dispenser System (Pack of 3)
product_meta.description:
Item Package Quantity:3| Size:Wave

HotelSpa Wave Luxury Soap/Shampoo/Lotion Modular-Design Shower Dispenser System

De-clutter your shower with these liquid-soap dispensers. Each dispenser holds soap, shampoo, lotion, or conditioner in its large, clear reservoir, dispensing it at the press of a button. The dispensers are designed with independent modular sections to tailor-fit your bath space and mount easily on any surface with waterproof adhesive mounting brackets, from which they can be removed for cleaning. 

Your order will arrive in an Easy-to-Open Packaging that protects your product during shipping. No hard to open plastic casings or cheap poly bags! Each box contains Three Dispensers, Three Double-Sided Adhesive Strips, 3 Sets of 2 Anchors and 2 Screws and detailed easy-to-follow Installation Manual to make the installation process effortless and perfect! 

Every Soap Dispenser has easy to register hustle-Free LIMITED FIVE YEAR WARRANTY! If you have any questions about our products, please contact our Customer Service and they will be glad to answer all your questions! 



 * Available in Packs of 1, 2 or 3
 * Each dispenser section come with its own wall bracket for personal configuration at various heights and distances
 * Dispenses liquid soap, shampoo, lotion, or conditioner
 * Large liquid capacity chamber
 * Easy to Refill
 * Clog-Free pump design
 * Chrome Finish
 * Shatter-Resistant body
 * Tool-Free installation and removal


HotelSpa Modular Soap Dispensers are perfect for any room in your house or office and allow you to buy your favorite soap or shampoo in bulk to save money and preserve the environment by reducing plastic consumption.
feature_bullets: HotelSpa® Wave Luxury Soap/Shampoo/Lotion Modular-Design Shower Dispenser System: De-clutter your shower with these liquid-soap dispensers. Each dispenser holds soap, shampoo, lotion, or conditioner in its large, clear reservoir, dispensing it at the press of a button.
INCLUDED: 3 Dispensers, 3 Double-Sided Adhesive Strip, 3 Sets of 2 Anchors and 2 Screws and detailed easy-to-follow Installation Manual to make the installation process effortless and perfect!

FEATURES: • Each dispenser section come with its own wall bracket • Individual modular brackets allow for personal configuration at various heights and distances • Dispenses liquid soap, shampoo, lotion, or conditioner • Large liquid capacity chamber • Easy to Refill • Clog-Free pump design • Chrome Finish • Shatter-Resistant body

INSTALLATION: • Tool-Free installation and removal • The dispensers are designed with independent modular sections to tailor-fit your bath space and mount easily on any surface with waterproof adhesive mounting brackets, from which they can be removed for cleaning.

WARRANTY: Easy to register hustle-Free LIMITED FIVE YEAR WARRANTY. If you have any questions either prior or after purchasing our products, please contact our Customer Service and they will be glad to answer all your questions!
